nomial of degree 5 or higher. However, the Abel-Rufﬁni theorem (Rufﬁni,Abel-Rufﬁni
theorem 1799; Abel, 1826) states that there exists no algebraic solution to this
problem for polynomials of degree 5 or more. Therefore, in practice, wenp.linalg.eigh
or
np.linalg.svd
solve for eigenvalues or singular values using iterative methods, which are
implemented in all modern packages for linear algebra.
